title: Kawhi Leonard, Lakers, Nets, and NBA free agency
itunes:title: Kawhi Leonard, Lakers, Nets, and NBA free agency
description:
Colin explains why the Brooklyn Nets are more interesting than good after getting Kevin Durant and Kyrie Irving. He goes on to say that Kawhi Leonard has the power to shape the NBA by simply choosing which team to sign with. Also the latest on NBA free agency and how close the Los Angeles Lakers are to forming a super team. Guests include Chris Broussard, Arash Markazi, Charles Barkley, and Ric Bucher. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
